mapper.select: select notice_code, notice_title, notice_writer, notice_date, notice_count, NULL, '0' from notice_mst order by notice_code desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice_mst values( #{notice_code}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_writer}, now(), 0, now(), now() )
insert into notice_dtl values( #{notice_code}, #{notice_content}, #{originFileNames}, #{tempFileNames}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY nn.notice_code, np.notice_code desc) AS num, nm.notice_code, nm.notice_title, nm.notice_writer, nm.notice_date, nm.notice_count, nd.notice_content, nd.originFileNames, nd.tempFileNames, nn.notice_code AS nextNotice_code, nn.notice_title AS nextNotice_title, np.notice_code AS preNotice_code, np.notice_title AS preNotice_title FROM notice_mst nm LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_dtl nd ON(nd.notice_code = nm.notice_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_mst nn ON(nn.notice_code > nm.notice_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_mst np ON(np.notice_code < nm.notice_code) WHERE nm.notice_code = #{notice_code} LIMIT 1;
mapper.update: update notice_mst set notice_count = notice_count + 1 where notice_code = #{notice_code};
update notice_dtl set notice_content = #{notice_content}, originFileNames = #{originFileNames}, tempFileNames = #{tempFileNames}, update_date = now() where notice_code = #{notice_code};
